issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Redirect to another system (Engage, a different open source project, etc.)
resolution.name: Redirect

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.description:
After restore of an instance eucanetd failed to restart dhcpd leaving the cluster in a bad state. The eucanetd error is:

{code}
2015-06-19 17:37:29 DEBUG 000029663 network_driver_implement | Restarting DHCP service.
2015-06-19 17:37:29 ERROR 000029663 eucanetd_kick_dhcpd_serv | Fail to restart DHCP server. exitcode='256'
2015-06-19 17:37:29 DEBUG 000029663 eucanetd_kick_dhcpd_serv | DHCPD Server Command='//usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap /usr/sbin/dhcpd -cf //var/run/eucalyptus/net/euca-dhcp.conf -lf //var/run/eucalyptus/net/euca-dhcp.leases -pf //var/run/eucalyptus/net/euca-dhcp.pid -tf //var/run/eucalyptus/net/euca-dhcp.trace'
2015-06-19 17:37:29 ERROR 000029663 network_driver_implement | unable to (re)configure local dhcpd server: check above log errors for details
2015-06-19 17:37:29 ERROR 000029663 main                     | could not complete VM addressing update: check above log errors for details
{code}

The dhcpd error from /var/log/messages is:

{code}
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: Internet Systems Consortium DHCP Server 4.1.1-P1
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: Copyright 2004-2010 Internet Systems Consortium.
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: All rights reserved.
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: For info, please visit https://www.isc.org/software/dhcp/
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: WARNING: Overwriting trace file "//var/run/eucalyptus/net/euca-dhcp.trace"
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: WARNING: Host declarations are global.  They are not limited to the scope you declared them in.
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: Not searching LDAP since ldap-server, ldap-port and ldap-base-dn were not specified in the config file
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: Wrote 0 deleted host decls to leases file.
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: Wrote 0 new dynamic host decls to leases file.
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: Wrote 0 leases to leases file.
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: No subnet declaration for em1.606 (no IPv4 addresses).
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: ** Ignoring requests on em1.606.  If this is not what
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    you want, please write a subnet declaration
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    in your dhcpd.conf file for the network segment
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    to which interface em1.606 is attached. **
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: No subnet declaration for sg-4ef461a8 (172.16.75.129).
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: ** Ignoring requests on sg-4ef461a8.  If this is not what
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    you want, please write a subnet declaration
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    in your dhcpd.conf file for the network segment
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    to which interface sg-4ef461a8 is attached. **
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: No subnet declaration for em1.116 (no IPv4 addresses).
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: ** Ignoring requests on em1.116.  If this is not what
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    you want, please write a subnet declaration
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    in your dhcpd.conf file for the network segment
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    to which interface em1.116 is attached. **
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: No subnet declaration for em1.107 (10.107.105.139).
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: ** Ignoring requests on em1.107.  If this is not what
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    you want, please write a subnet declaration
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    in your dhcpd.conf file for the network segment
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    to which interface em1.107 is attached. **
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: No subnet declaration for em1 (169.254.169.254).
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: ** Ignoring requests on em1.  If this is not what
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    you want, please write a subnet declaration
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    in your dhcpd.conf file for the network segment
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:    to which interface em1 is attached. **
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: Not configured to listen on any interfaces!
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: This version of ISC DHCP is based on the release available
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: on ftp.isc.org.  Features have been added and other changes
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: have been made to the base software release in order to make
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: it work better with this distribution.
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: Please report for this software via the CentOS Bugs Database:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:     http://bugs.centos.org/
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd:
Jun 19 17:37:03 d-15 dhcpd: exiting.
{code}

Configuration file:

{code}
# automatically generated config file for DHCP server
default-lease-time 86400;
max-lease-time 86400;
ddns-update-style none;

shared-network euca {
  subnet 172.16.67.32 netmask 255.255.255.224 {
    option subnet-mask 255.255.255.224;
    option broadcast-address 172.16.67.63;
    option domain-name "eucalyptus.internal";
    option domain-name-servers 10.111.5.139;
    option routers 172.16.67.33;
  }
  subnet 172.16.75.160 netmask 255.255.255.224 {
    option subnet-mask 255.255.255.224;
    option broadcast-address 172.16.75.191;
    option domain-name "eucalyptus.internal";
    option domain-name-servers 10.111.5.139;
    option routers 172.16.75.161;
  }

  host node-172.16.75.184 {
    hardware ethernet D0:0D:34:8D:D7:12;
    fixed-address 172.16.75.184;
  }

  host node-172.16.75.140 {
    hardware ethernet D0:0D:22:8E:6E:08;
    fixed-address 172.16.75.140;
  }

  host node-172.16.67.61 {
    hardware ethernet D0:0D:19:F6:80:30;
    fixed-address 172.16.67.61;
  }

  host node-172.16.67.77 {
    hardware ethernet D0:0D:E8:DD:1D:4C;
    fixed-address 172.16.67.77;
  }
}
{code}

fields.summary: EC2 new/old instances unreachable after instance restore

comments.body: There was a problem with restoring network info in the service (addressed in EUCA-10674), this issue no longer occurs as described.
